availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Organized at Chicago, Illinois. Mustered into service in October 1861. Mustered out of service in July 1865. Commander: Colonel Andrew Porter and Edwin F. Townsend

ab.bibl:
U.S. Civil War Pension Index: General Index to Pension Files, 1861-1934, NARA RG 15, Microfilm Series T288, Application 246460, Certificate 187382.
Frederick Dyer, A Compendium of the War of the Rebellion (Des Moines: The Dyer Publishing Company, 1908), 1714-5.
Frank J. Welcher, _The Union Army, 1861-1865: Organization and Operations, Volume II: The Western Theater, (Bloomington: University of Indiana Press, 1993), 805
